channel.title: New category: Buying & Selling
channel.description:
We've added a new category to the forum: [**"Buying & Selling"**](http://discuss.bootstrapped.fm/c/buying-and-selling)
It's a place for you to post your bootstrapped businesses for sale, and a place where you can post your interest in purchasing a bootstrapped business. It is not our intent to play middle-man in any way that would affect the potential resulting transaction. We just wanted to give you a place to post your offering or interest, browse existing listings, and connect as needed.
